page.title: 09EVENTS:BED'HM:HED'HM
page.content: Bedingham is involved in a major church restoration scheme involving the roof & clerestory windows & is also having the century-old organ ex- tensively repaired.The considerable sums of money needed come partly from the community,partly as a loan from the Diocese & partly from a Govt. grant,Â£15000 in all. Hedenham has recently bought the old schoolroom to ensure its use as a{village hall.} Both villages have way-marked bridleways & footpaths using South Norfolk DC signs & both have planted trees over the past 15 years - Beding- ham as a Parish scheme with NCC help - & in both parishes individuals & the estates take up Countryside Commission grants for planting on their land.Reg- ular events,coffee evenings,sales or auctions, elicit a splendid response, whatever is the current pressing need!
